item.title: 编译运行cuTLASS
item.description: 1. 环境 1.1 Prerequisites $ git clone https://github.com/NVIDIA/cutlass CUTLASS requires: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit (9.2 or later required, 11.1 recommended) CMake 3.12+ host compiler supporting C++11 or greater (g++ 7.3.0 or Microsoft Visual Studio 2015 recommended) Python 3.6+ CUTLASS may be optionally compiled and linked with cuBLAS cuDNN v7.6 or later 1.1.1 cmake 官方给出了建议的环境，cmake 没
